sermons.title: Passing Under the Rod
sermons.description: This is a message that will bring everyone that believes in Pentecost, under the rod. From the "Call to Repentance" conference in Tifton, Ga. in 1986. This sermon is from Ezek 20:33-40 and Ezek chapters 8-9, and examines the promise of God's judgment -- and his protection of those who "sigh and groan over all the abominations being committed in [Zion's] midst."
